Nice to meet you

I am Gowtham, Indian Computer Science Engineering graduate and an Associate level engineer. I am a fresher, last year I completed my internship and started my carrer at Virtusa. Currently, I have 6 months working experience.

I love working with decision-makers on the intersection of design, strategy, and business. I believe this is where the software development process can have the biggest impact. I created this site for my passion towards owning a portfolio website.

In 2018, I completed my schooling then I graduated from Lovely Professional University in 2022. Web desing is my hobby but my skills go beyond that. I am also a Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer.

I'm based in Kovilpatti, a town in south Tamilnadu.
